d: Lunetius is a lacerna, a historical Roman cloak

lengthRatio.d: Controls the length of the garment

widthRatio.d: Controls the width of the garment

length.d: Choose from the different length styles

length.toHips.d: Draft a lacerna that ends at the hips

length.toUpperLeg.d: Draft a lacerna that ends at the upper leg or thigh

length.toKnee.d: Draft a lacerna that ends at the knee

length.toBelowKnee.d: Draft a lacerna ends below the knee

length.toFloor.d: Draft a full-length lacerna down to the floor
